snippet: The cost of the two-week walkout was higher than initially predicted and, along with a decline in year-end bookings, will drag down profit this year.
abstract: Air France estimates cost of two-week strike by its pilots at more than $400 million and warns that strike, along with decline in year-end reservations, could erase sizable portion of its core profit.
lead_paragraph: The cost of the two-week walkout was higher than initially predicted and, along with a decline in year-end bookings, will drag down profit this year.

headline.main: Air France Puts Cost of Pilots’ Strike at More Than $400 Million
headline.print_headline: Air France Says Pilots’ Strike Cost More Than $400 Million
